page.title: 19Why we came to live here
page.content: We used to live near{Warwick.}We moved to{Derbyshire}because my dad changed his job. We moved to{Duffield}because lots of people recommended{Ecclesbourne}as an excellent school.Also most of the{nice {houses}are to the north of Derby. Duffield is set in lovely hilly surroundings.It is mainly in a{valley so you can see{countryside hills almost anywhere in the village. My family moved into our house at 24,Chestnut Close on Friday,5th.July. It was very hot and the removal men looked as if they'd just come out of the shower,they were sweating so much. It took a long time to pack the removal van because it wasn't big enough and the doors wouldn't close. We like living in Duffield because {everybody}seems extremely{friendly. }
